script.title: setMacLimitBpduDrop.slax
script.author: mpergament
script.synopsis: Set bpdu-drop option and MAC limiting based on port description.
script.description: This script sets MAC limiting on access ports which have "MACLIM" string within port description string and sets bpdu-drop option if "BPDUDROP" string is contained within descriptiong. It can be easily adopted if different MAC limiting profiles should be supported on different access ports (e.g. MACLIM1 => limit the number of MAC addresses to 100, MACLIM2 => limit the number of MAC addresses to 200).
